value:
A power to activate gates possessed
only by royalty... And a power to
summon possessed only by...$k$pI am incredibly fascinated by each
and every one of you.

I'm with the Shepherds. They're quite
lax when it comes to keeping track of
their personal belongings, but...$k$pI believe you would agree with my
evaluation that they are quite
proficient when it comes to battle.

It appears the burden of our mission
has left you quite weary.$k$pIf you wish to achieve more efficient
battle results, you must remember to
take a break now and again.

I have some research to conduct
outdoors, but my grasp of Askran
geography is lacking.$k$pWould you be interested in assisting
me as my guide?

Take care that you do not misplace
your divine weapon.$k$pI was admiring the perfect
organizational structure of my
literature and thought to remind you.

Your acquaintance
$Nf requested
I deliver a greeting to you.$k$pThat done, I will be on my way.

Never sate yourself with middling
returns!

These results are...generally
satisfying.

Someone must preserve the
status quo.

If my calculations are correct, I
can now perform at a higher rate.

I am Miriel, of the Shepherds. I do not
believe I've been to this world
before... How terribly fascinating.

Ah, it's you. I was so entrenched in
my thoughts I didn't notice you
approach. Oh, no, you needn't leave.$k$pI would never consider a subject of
my fascination to be intruding on my
time. Please, stay as long as you like.$k$pEspecially since your being here
means you won't be summoning any
more Heroes...$k$pThe arrival of a new Hero always
leaves me...vexed. On the one hand,
it's another specimen to study.$k$pBut on the other, I find it irksome to
have your attentions directed toward
someone else.$k$pWhat? That's called jealousy? I see.
Then, I suppose I'm jealous.$k$pI will make a note of how troublesome
this emotion is.$k$p...There.$k$pBut surely this emotion must have
practical applications as well...
はいっ
せやっ
ぐっ…！
I didn't anticipate this...
Your demise is nigh.
Rebarbative fool.
Begone, foul miscreation!
Oh...you're still here?
How vexing.
Hehe...
A different world... Fascinating.
Make sure your posessions are secured at all times. Please.
You have a divine weapon and the ability to summon Heroes. May I study you?
Is this physical contact intended as an attempt to increase interpersonal familiarity and establish a stronger bond? Fascinating.
Yes, I do find the Order of Heroes a worthy subject for observation.
The universe contains so many fascinating things I have yet to see...
Since coming here, I have learned of so many more mysteries worth investigating. I have you to thank for this.
Understood.
Enlighten me.
Fascinating.
